game.name: Train Simulator: Horseshoe Curve Route Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Drive along this famous railroad and try your driving skills on the tight turns and steep gradients of the famous Pennsylvanian Horseshoe Curve!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Drive along this famous railroad and try your driving skills on the tight turns and steep gradients of the famous Pennsylvanian Horseshoe Curve!
